localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: If you love topic-based learning, this is for you! Organize your learning journey with curations and creations. Share knowledge collections to benefit and discuss with peers. Build your personal brand around your learning portfolio.
blogPost.body: If you love topic-based learning, this is for you! Organize your learning journey with curations and creations. Share knowledge collections to benefit and discuss with peers. Build your personal brand around your learning portfolio.
blogPost.title: PalPark - Curate and share your learnings by topics
blogPost.author: Yixin Kou

localize.description: 如果你喜欢主题式学习，这就是你的选择! 用策展和创作来组织你的学习之旅。分享知识集锦，与同行共同受益和讨论。围绕你的学习组合建立你的个人品牌。
localize.tagline: 按主题策划和分享您的学习成果

localize.description: 如果你喜歡主題式學習，這就是你的選擇! 用策展和創作來組織你的學習之旅。分享知識集錦，與同行共同受益和討論。圍繞你的學習組合建立你的個人品牌。
localize.tagline: 按主題策劃和分享您的學習成果

previous.excerpt: HomeWerk helps teams to socialize and build stronger relationships regardless of location, time-zone and position within a company. We provide consistently positive automated team building sessions to keep teams talking about everything, apart from work!
previous.title: HomeWerk - Helping teams stay happy whilst working remotely

localize.description: HomeWerk帮助团队进行社交活动，并建立更牢固的关系，而不受地点、时区和公司内部职位的限制。我们提供持续积极的自动化团队建设课程，让团队除了工作之外，还能谈论其他一切。
localize.tagline: 帮助团队在远程工作中保持快乐

localize.description: HomeWerk幫助團隊進行社交活動，並建立更牢固的關係，而不受地點、時區和公司內部職位的限制。我們提供持續積極的自動化團隊建設課程，讓團隊除了工作之外，還能談論其他一切。
localize.tagline: 幫助團隊在遠程工作中保持快樂

next.excerpt: Sivo provides debt as a service. Our API allows companies to access debt funding and lend money to their users at scale. Sivo is backed by Y Combinator (W21).
next.title: Sivo - Access debt funding and lend money to users at scale

localize.description: Sivo提供债务即服务。我们的API允许企业获得债务融资，并大规模地借钱给用户。Sivo得到了Y Combinator（W21）的支持。
localize.tagline: 获取债务资金，规模化借贷给用户

localize.description: Sivo提供債務即服務。我們的API允許企業獲得債務融資，並大規模地借錢給用戶。Sivo得到了Y Combinator（W21）的支持。
localize.tagline: 獲取債務資金，規模化借貸給用戶
